text: Wanhu wamulongela Sauli, “Habali Yonatani yakomigwe, na heyo ayo yagalile mhumo ng'hulu mwiisi ya Izilaeli? Mbuli ayo haidahika hata kidogo kamba vija Mndewa Imulungu viyokala mgima, hata luvili lumoja lwa kudipala jake halulagala hasi, kiyatendile lelo katenda kwa mbuli ya Imulungu.” Avo wanhu wamgombola Yonatani avo hakomigwe bule.
